```{r fig.width = 7}
library(rfrappe)

data <- list(
  labels = c("12am-3am", "3am-6pm", "6am-9am", "9am-12am", "12pm-3pm", "3pm-6pm", "6pm-9pm", "9am-12am"),
  datasets = list(
    list(
      title = "Some Data",
      color = "light-blue",
      values = c(25, 40, 30, 35, 8, 52, 17, -4)
    ),
    list(
      title = "Another Set",
      color = "violet",
      values = c(25, 50, -10, 15, 18, 32, 27, 14)
    )
  )
)

rfrappe(list(
  title = "My Awesome Plot",
  data = data,
  type = "bar"
))
```
